repo_description: Tools to produce offloading insole designs in Rhino CAD
code:
# get insole outline coordinates

import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

heel_center_pt = rs.GetPoint("Heel Center Pt")
heel_center_lat_pt = rs.GetPoint("Heel Center Lateral Pt")
heel_lateral_pt = rs.GetPoint("Heel Lateral Pt")
arch_lateral_pt = rs.GetPoint("Arch Lateral Pt")
mtpj5_prox_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ5 prox Pt")
mtpj5_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ5 Pt")
mtpj5_dist1_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ5 Dist 1 Pt")
mtpj5_dist2_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ5 Dist 2 Pt")
ff_lat_pt = rs.GetPoint("Forefoot Lateral Pt")
toe_lat_pt = rs.GetPoint("Toe Lateral Pt")
toe_pt = rs.GetPoint("Toe Pt")
toe_med_pt = rs.GetPoint("Toe Medial Pt")
ff_med_pt = rs.GetPoint("Forefoot Medial Pt")
mtpj1_dist2_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ1 Dist 2 Pt")
mtpj1_dist1_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ1 Dist 1 Pt")
mtpj1_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ1 Pt")
mtpj1_prox_pt = rs.GetPoint("MTPJ1 Prox Pt")
arch_medial_pt = rs.GetPoint("Arch Medial Pt")
heel_medial_pt = rs.GetPoint("Heel Medial Pt")
heel_center_med_pt = rs.GetPoint("Heel Center Medial Pt")

print heel_center_pt[1]
print heel_center_lat_pt[0]
print heel_center_lat_pt[1]
print heel_lateral_pt[0]
print heel_lateral_pt[1]
print arch_lateral_pt[0]
print arch_lateral_pt[1]
print mtpj5_prox_pt[0]
print mtpj5_prox_pt[1]
print mtpj5_pt[0]
print mtpj5_pt[1]
print mtpj5_dist1_pt[0]
print mtpj5_dist1_pt[1]
print mtpj5_dist2_pt[0]
print mtpj5_dist2_pt[1]
print ff_lat_pt[0]
print ff_lat_pt[1]
print toe_lat_pt[0]
print toe_lat_pt[1]
print toe_pt[0]
print toe_pt[1]
print toe_med_pt[0]
print toe_med_pt[1]
print ff_med_pt[0]
print ff_med_pt[1]
print mtpj1_dist2_pt[0]
print mtpj1_dist2_pt[1]
print mtpj1_dist1_pt[0]
print mtpj1_dist1_pt[1]
print mtpj1_pt[0]
print mtpj1_pt[1]
print mtpj1_prox_pt[0]
print mtpj1_prox_pt[1]
print arch_medial_pt[0]
print arch_medial_pt[1]
print heel_medial_pt[0]
print heel_medial_pt[1]
print heel_center_med_pt[0]
print heel_center_med_pt[1]
